resources.name: ParentalInsults
items: Got plans with the real dad
I will literally murder the child...
I'm learning a new programming language
Trying to take over the world
I got a pool and no fence
Checking into a mental health facility
Playing with my new Neilogd Blow-up doll
I'm helping BlackBird change his name

I'm telling people on
the internet that they're wrong!
I thought it was your turn

My father's in hospital
Or will be anyway...
I have the exorcist coming this weekend

My house is full of peanuts and
we both know the kid's allergic
I have to kick stupid people from IRC channels
I'm finding out if another kid is mine
They keep eating all of my chocolate!
They keep eating all of my cheese!
They drink all of my beer
They drink all of my wine
The always want help with their homework
I'm getting sterilised so I won't have another
I just wanna watch porn all weekend
I'm acting in porn all weekend

Your mum and I are acting in
porn all weekend. Don't tell her
I'm working with the Illudumati this weekend
I'm helping restore LDTP this weekend
I'm going to war with LDTP this weekend
I will convert that child to LDTO!
I will convert that child to LDTD!
